message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $13,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product to you.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13,200.
